issues.message: Missing or invalid `encodingFormat` linked to the `File Data Entity`

check.label: RECOMMENDED 24.1
check.name: File Data Entity: RECOMMENDED `encodingFormat` property
check.description:
Check if the File Data Entity has a detailed description of encodings through the `encodingFormat` property.
        The `encodingFormat` property SHOULD be a PRONOM identifier (e.g., application/pdf) or,
        to add more detail, SHOULD be linked using a `PRONOM` to  a `Contextual Entity` of type `WebSite`
        (see [Adding detailed descriptions of encodings](https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/1.1/data-entities.html#adding-detailed-descriptions-of-encodings)).

requirement.name: File Data Entity: RECOMMENDED properties
requirement.description: A `File` Data Entity SHOULD have detailed descriptions encodings through the `encodingFormat` property

issues.message: The organization SHOULD have a URL.

check.name: Organization: RECOMMENDED url property

requirement.name: Organization: RECOMMENDED properties
